law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 568, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 2004 Ky. Acts ch. 189, sec. 2, effective July 13, 2004. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 514, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1978 Ky. Acts ch. 37, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1978. -- Amended 1974 Ky. Acts ch. 74, Art. VI, sec. 107(1). -- Created 1954 Ky. Acts ch. 119, sec. 1, effective June 17, 1954.
